name: Skeletory
description:
This game its really inspirated in my past and personal toughts I've had with myself. But lets keep it as fiction.

Translated to English and Spanish.

This game its just a way to express myself and should not be taken more than an opinion.

Hope you enjoy it as much as I am! Thanks for let ALL YOUR FEEDBACK in the comments, I'll read it all and its really valuable for me. :)

Created for Weekly Game Jam #147 this game was very interesting to make.

Specials thanks to Azu for the translation.

You also can download it for windows bellow.
